40604.summary: Some customers in the South Pandosy - K.L.O area of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
40604.title: Aug 14 – Kelowna (South Pandosy - K.L.O) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
